uber

Class UberIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • uber.UberIO

  • public class UberIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls I/O for the Uber program Uses JSON Contains warning because of json.simple's lack of generics and use of raw types
    Author:
    Tim Lee

      • initialize

        public static UsersList initialize(java.lang.String fileName)
        Initializes the Users based on the input file Assumes properly formatted JSON in .txt or .json file Nonexistent or improperly formatted files cause method to return null
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the input file to open
        Returns:
        the set of initialized Users

        Returns:
        a List of Passengers

      • tripLog

        public static void tripLog(java.util.List<Trip> trips,
                           java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves all trips as a JSON file Currently saves all data on one line; attempt to find way to format data onto multiple lines
        Parameters:
        trips - the List of Trips to save
        fileName - the path to the location to save the data

      • encodeTrip

        public static org.json.simple.JSONObject encodeTrip(Trip trip)
        Helper method for tripLog() encodes a single Trip as a JSON object
        Parameters:
        trip - the trip to encode
        Returns:
        an encoded JSONObject

      • finalOutput

                               UsersList users,
                               java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a final output text file
        Parameters:
        trips - the List of executed Trips
        users - the set of all Users
        fileName - the file location to save the data
